name: part_011
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね生誕祭2024 】ムシキングとラブベリ実機で遊んでみた‼ライブパートもあるよん‼【桃鈴ねね⧸hololive】 [mlsJvmN-z74]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene introduces her birthday commemoration merchandise set and the special purchase bonuses.
Nene talks about Yukihana Lamy not being able to attend and reads a letter from her.

subtitles.original: 確かめてください。
subtitles.english: Please check it out.

subtitles.original: そして今回も、えー、フルセットの購入特典があります。こちら！
subtitles.english:
And this time too, there's a purchase bonus
for the full set. Here it is!

subtitles.original: 誕生日記念フルセット
subtitles.english: Birthday Commemoration Full Set

subtitles.original: えー、フルセットを買っていただきますと、え、ポストカードと特典のボイスがついてきます。こちら！
subtitles.english:
Um, if you buy the full set, it comes with a
postcard and a bonus voice. Here!

subtitles.original: フルセット購入特典
subtitles.english: Full Set Purchase Bonus

subtitles.original: 購入特典はね、見てみんな。あの、お顔がね、ちょっともう酔っ払っちゃっちゃっぴーみたいな感じの顔になってるポストカードと、
subtitles.english:
The purchase bonus, look everyone.
On this postcard, my face looks a bit like
"I'm already drunk-appy," and...

subtitles.original: えー、直筆サイン＆箔押しの複製メッセージ入りポストカード！
subtitles.english:
...a postcard with a handwritten signature
and a foil-stamped replicated message!

subtitles.original: え、そして、え、お風呂上がりにいっぱい喉が渇いて飲んじゃって、「あ、酔っ払っちゃった〜」みたいなボイスがついてきまーす。
subtitles.english:
And, um, a voice pack like "Ah, I got drunk~"
from drinking a lot because I was thirsty after
a bath.

subtitles.original: あの、あの、ぜひ、ぜひぜひぜひ、あの、よろしくお願いします。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english:
Um, um, please, please please please, um,
look forward to it. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: え、そしてですね、今回、あの、本当はね、ねぽらぼ全員呼びたかったんですけど、ま、タイミングとかね、体調のこともありまして、ラミィが来れなかったんですよ。
subtitles.english:
And also, this time, um, to be honest, I
wanted to invite all of NePolabo, but due to
timing and health issues, Lamy couldn't come.

subtitles.original: でも、ラミィに「ねぇ、あとなんか、なんか頂戴」って言ったら、あの、お手紙をくれたので、ラミィのお手紙、ねねまだ見てないので、あの、ここで晒していきたいと思います。
subtitles.english:
But when I asked Lamy, "Hey, give me
something else," she gave me a letter.
Nene hasn't seen it yet, so I'd like to share it
here.

subtitles.original: これです！
subtitles.english: Here it is!

subtitles.original: ハッピーバースデー！いつも周りの人を笑顔に、そして元気をくれるねねかが大好きだよ！
subtitles.english:
Happy birthday! I love Nenekka, who always
makes everyone around her smile and gives
them energy!

subtitles.original: ポンコツなところも、アイドルに全力なところも、全部大好き！ちゅきちゅきちゅき！
subtitles.english:
I love everything about you, from your ditzy
side to how you give your all as an idol!
Love, love, love you!

subtitles.original: あ、これ二人で歌ってみたの時のやつですね。ん〜
subtitles.english:
Ah, this is from when the two of us did a
'tried singing' cover. Mmm.

subtitles.original: う、ラミィさん、いい、いいわ〜。なんかいいじゃないの。なんか。これはちょっと後で現像して額に入れることにします。
subtitles.english:
Uhh, Lamy-san, this is nice, so nice. It's just
good. I'll develop this later and put it in a
frame.

subtitles.original: というわけで、今日はタイミング的に、えー、ラミィはいなくて。そして、おまるは今日、あの、無事に戻ってきたということで、お祝いも込めて、
subtitles.english:
So, because of the timing, Lamy isn't here
today. And since Omaru successfully returned
today, to celebrate that as well,

subtitles.original: 最後は、えっと、ねぽぼ、3人で歌っていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english:
Lastly, um, the three of us, NePoBo, will sing
together!

subtitles.original: それでは最後、レッツゴー！いいだよー！
subtitles.english: Now for the last part, let's go! It's okay!

subtitles.original:
U&I
作詞：平沢 唯　作曲・編曲：前澤 寛之
subtitles.english:
U&I
Lyrics: Hirasawa Yui / Music: Maezawa Hiroyuki

subtitles.original: 君がいないと　何もできないよ
subtitles.english: I can't do anything without you

subtitles.original: 君のご飯が食べたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to eat your cooking

subtitles.original: もし君が帰ってきたら　とびきりの笑顔で
subtitles.english: If you were to come back, with a huge smile

subtitles.original: 抱きつくよ
subtitles.english: I'd give you a big hug

subtitles.original: 君がいないと　謝れないよ
subtitles.english: I can't apologize without you

subtitles.original: 君の声が聞きたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to hear your voice

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔が見れれば
subtitles.english: If I can see your smile

subtitles.original: それだけでいいんだよ
subtitles.english: That's all I need

subtitles.original: 君がそばにいるだけで
subtitles.english: Just having you by my side

subtitles.original: いつも勇気もらってた
subtitles.english: Always gave me courage

subtitles.original: いつまでも一緒にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be with you forever

subtitles.original: この気持ちを伝えたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to tell you how I feel

subtitles.original: 晴れの日も　雨の日も
subtitles.english: On sunny days, and on rainy days

subtitles.original: 君はそばにいてくれた
subtitles.english: You were there by my side

subtitles.original: 目を閉じれば君の笑顔
subtitles.english: When I close my eyes, your smile

subtitles.original: 輝いてる
subtitles.english: Is shining

subtitles.original: 君がいないと　何もわからないよ
subtitles.english: I don't understand anything without you

subtitles.original: 砂糖と醤油はどこだっけ
subtitles.english: Where were the sugar and soy sauce again?

subtitles.original: もし君が帰ってきたら　びっくりさせようと
subtitles.english:
If you were to come back, I'd try to surprise
you

subtitles.original: 思ってたのにな
subtitles.english: Is what I was thinking

subtitles.original: 君についつい甘えちゃうよ
subtitles.english: I end up depending on you

subtitles.original: 君が優しすぎるから
subtitles.english: Because you're just too kind

subtitles.original: 君にもらってばかりで
subtitles.english: I'm always receiving from you

subtitles.original: 何もあげられてないよ
subtitles.english: And haven't been able to give anything back

subtitles.original: 君がそばにいることを
subtitles.english: That you being by my side

subtitles.original: 当たり前に思ってた
subtitles.english: Is something I took for granted

subtitles.original: こんな日々が　ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: That days like these, on and on

subtitles.original: 続くんだと思ってたよ
subtitles.english: Would just continue, I thought

subtitles.original: ごめん　今は気づいたよ
subtitles.english: Sorry, now I finally realize
